title: Calories in Ritz Crackers
meta_description: Discover calories in Ritz crackers per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and variations for better tracking.
assumptions: Original flavor Ritz crackers; standard serving of 5 crackers (about 16 g); no toppings or spreads.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and serving size; always check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard serving of 5 Ritz crackers contains about 80 calories and 10 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp peanut butter per cracker
Use whole wheat Ritz crackers instead

faqs.q: How many calories in one Ritz cracker?
faqs.a: About 16 calories per single Ritz cracker.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 5 Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 g of carbohydrates, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are Ritz crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 5 crackers have about 135 mg sodium—about 6% of daily value.

faqs.q: How much fat in Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: 5 crackers contain 3.5 g total fat, including 1 g saturated fat.
Minimal—only about 1 g protein in a serving of 5 crackers.
